meta.hint:
The subject of the sentence is the person, place, or thing that is doing something. It tells about whom or what the sentence is about.
Example - The grasshopper jumps in the grass.
meta.question: Identify the subject in the sentence.

content.description: John and Mark are painting the walls.
content.extra: are painting, John and Mark, the walls

content.description: Sam received lots of gifts on her birthday.
